title: Gemini Code Assist Review: Code Completions Need Improvement
author: David Eastman
description: Senior engineer David Eastman takes Google's new Gemini Code Assist for a spin, and compares its output to GitHub Copilot and Augment Code.
cntitle: 双子座代码助手审查：代码补全需要改进
cndescription: 资深工程师David Eastman试用了谷歌最新的Gemini 代码助手，并将其输出结果与GitHub Copilot和Augment Code进行了比较。
